name: Jam a man of Fortune - xQc Fan Game
name_original: Jam a man of Fortune - xQc Fan Game
description:
You (xQc) wake up and remember nothing...

what will you do?
how will you act?
how do you decide?
You make the choises! 

You play as xQc waking up without any knowledge what happened, you just want to get home to start another Stream! Can you manage to bring xQc back home to start a stream?

DISCLAIMER: The entire Game was made in  3.5 HOURS
This Game was made for the "Trijam 174" with the Theme "A Game based on a Quote" and a time limitation of a maximum of 3 hours! Please keep in mind that some (or all) parts of the Project are not finished or well polished due to these limitations!

(At the end the Development of this Game took me 3.5 Hours, excluding building and uploading the project)
